Text: New Media Markets The latest issue delivered to your desktopNew Media Markets cgibinfoamclickcgiical bookshopinformamediacomnewmediamarkets cgibinfoamclickcgiical Dear MR M MC CONNELL A great source of industry information one of the few journals I actually read from cover to cover Gary Dale Chief Executive Granada Sky Broadcasting Front Cover emailsnmmcovergifAs an industry professional you have been specially selected to receive three FREE issues of New Media Markets the weekly newsletter providing expert analysis industry data and market news on the converging media industry Now in its th year of publication New Media Markets covers all the essential market trends and regularly features news analysis and data on cable satellite and digitalterrestrial TV payTV payperview and videoondemand interactive television and tcommerce new television technology programming regulation IPOs bond issues and other financial deals One week is a long time in the fastpaced world of the modern media industry Timely accurate information is the key to success For a fraction of the cost of employing an external consultant or undertaking your own market research New Media Markets brings you hard news on the European media industry analysis of financing deals franchising agreements and joint ventures detailed insight into regulatory changes the latest data on audience research BARB viewing figures and international surveys discussion of market strategies and financial performance Essential timesensitive reading material for us in the financial markets Neil Blackley European Media Analyst Merrill Lynch CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD YOUR FIRST FREE ISSUE cgibinfoamclickcgiical Other benefits of subscribing to New Media Markets Youll become a member of the Subscriber Club Global PVR homes forecast to rise to m by end PERSONALTV cgibinfoamclickcgiical By more than of the worlds digital TV homes will be using personalised TV services How will you prepare for these pervasive new technologies Dear MR MC CONNELL PERSONAL TV is an indispensable resource providing you with all the information you need on the rapid growth and development of personalised TV viewing and the revolutionary impact the Personal Video Recorder PVR will have on the broadcasting industry especially following the widespread introduction of network storage Packed with comprehensive data and analysis PERSONAL TV is the ultimate strategic tool providing you with forecasts to market intelligence indepth analysis and statistics on these rapidly expanding markets CLICK BELOW TO VIEW THE FULL TABLE OF CONTENTS cgibinfoamclickcgiical CLICK BELOW TO VIEW THE EXECUTIVE SUMMARY cgibinfoamclickcgiical Use PERSONAL TV to gain valuable insights into TECHNOLOGY incisive comparisons and details of capabilities pricing issues competition and regulation plus a chapter dedicated to Middleware PVR CASE STUDIES learn about the impact PVRs will have on advertising schedules channels and content producers REGULATION indepth study on piracy and other regulatory issues set to affect the personal TV industry PLATFORMS intelligence and vital statistics on DVD Ondemand TV EPGs interactive TV services Internet TV and other personalised TV viewing options PERSONAL TV also contains indepth Company Profiles to give you essential information such as core activities and key products on all the key players in the Personal TV market featuring ReplayTV OpenTV Two Way TV ONdigital TiVo NTL CANAL BSkyB Can you afford to be without this essential resource Order your copy today Publication
